answers.answer: That's awesome news mama and congrats. Not too much longer now!

Mine is the size of a pineapple!!! I have 41 days left until my scheduled C-section, I'm excited too! Last time I had a baby was 14 years ago when I was 17. I'm having another girl, so I'll have a NB and a 14 year old. Starting all over again :)

Mine is a honeydew... 33 days left til my due date, but doctor said will induce at 39 weeks if I havent had her by then... so really only 26 days!!! Wow... I have a lot to do!!! Good to hear you dont have preeclampsia :)
Mine is the size of aLeek ..  whatever that is lol I have 20 days left!!!

question: My baby is the size of bok choy (56 days left) and I dont have preeclampsia. Dont know why my vision was acting weird but everything is all good :-)
title: Excited!!
